Pawnmorph.MorphDef.description: A human variant with a large number of random mutations. With such a mish-mash of changes there is no easy way to categorize them, but based on key features like the ability to produce morph-milk, this one can be considered a "chaocow".
Pawnmorph.MorphDef.label: chaocow morph

Pawnmorph.MorphDef.description: A human variant with a large number of random mutations. With such a mish-mash of changes there is no easy way to categorize them, but based on key features like the ability to produce chemfuel, this one can be considered a "chaoboom".
Pawnmorph.MorphDef.label: ChaoboomMorph
chaofox morph
Pawnmorph.MorphDef.description: A human variant with a large number of random mutations. With such a mish-mash of changes there is no easy way to categorize them, but based on key features such as a swathes of fur and a vulpine snout, this one can be considered a "chaofox".

A human variant with a large number of random mutations. With such a mish-mash of changes there is no easy way to categorize them, but based on key features like the ability to lay morph-eggs, this one can be considered a "chaodino".
Pawnmorph.MorphDef.label: chaodino morph
